update-readme.yml saves to virtual folders in github repo with dirs

- Status
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/status_working.svg
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/status_pending.svg
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/status_complete.svg
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/status_review.svg
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/status_todo.svg

- Issue Cards
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/issue_0.svg
  - https://github.com/traman2/BlackBoard-Scrubber/blob/generated-svgs/issue_1.svg
